catalogue_raissonne: Bouvenne 61; Beraldi 64; Hughes 63; Atherton Curtis 62 iii/vii
description: view down a city street with many pedestrians; dog, LLC; tall buildings on either side; tower with domed top at center background
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

at bottom center, printed in black: [London. Publisher, Oct. 5. 1828. by Mesrs Colnaghi & Co. Pall Mall. East]; LLC on mount, in pencil: [64]; LRC on mount, in pencil: [18]
provenance: [James A. Bergquist, Newton Centre, Mass., until 2009; sold in April for PKTO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2009-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC below image, in the plate: [RPB]; bottom center, printed below image: [Bologna]
title: Bologna
